trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_reach](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-reach-md.md)] serialization errors.
trans-unit.target: Undantag som genereras för [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_reach](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-reach-md.md)] serialisering fel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"> </xref> klass som innehåller ett specifikt fel.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"></xref> class that provides specific <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"> </xref> klass som innehåller specifika <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> och <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: De data som krävs för att serialisera eller deserialisering av objekt.

trans-unit.source: The context, which includes the source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: Kontexten som innehåller käll- och målservrar i den serialiserade dataströmmen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition and includes the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsSerializationException"> </xref> klass som innehåller en specifik feltillstånd och innehåller orsaken till undantaget.

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a `catch` block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Om den `innerException` parametern är inte `null` (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), det aktuella undantaget utlöses i en `catch` block som hanterar det interna undantaget.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: Det underliggande fel som orsakade undantaget.
